trans-unit.source: If you want to contribute to pretix, please read the developer documentation in our documentation. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to ask!
trans-unit.target: If you want to contribute to pretix, please read the developer documentation in our documentation. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to ask!

trans-unit.source: If you want to use or extend pretix, we strongly recommend to follow our blog. We will announce all releases there. You can always find the latest stable version on PyPI or in the
trans-unit.target: If you want to use or extend pretix, we strongly recommend to follow our blog. We will announce all releases there. You can always find the latest stable version on PyPI or in the

trans-unit.source: Reinventing presales, one ticket at a time
trans-unit.target: プリセールを一度に一枚のチケットで再発明

trans-unit.source: Reinventing ticket presales, one ticket at a time.
trans-unit.target: チケットのプリセールスを刷新する、一枚ずつのチケット。

trans-unit.source: The code in this repository is published under the terms of the Apache License. See the LICENSE file for the complete license text.
trans-unit.target: このリポジトリのコードは Apache ライセンスの条件で公開されています。ライセンスの全文は LICENSE ファイルを参照してください。

trans-unit.source: This project is 100 percent free and open source software. If you are interested in commercial support, hosting services or supporting this project financially, please go to pretix.eu or contact us at support@pretix.eu.
trans-unit.target: This project is 100 percent free and open source software. If you are interested in commercial support, hosting services or supporting this project financially, please go to pretix.eu or contact us at support@pretix.eu.

trans-unit.source: This project is maintained by Raphael Michel <mail@raphaelmichel.de>. See the AUTHORS file for a list of all the awesome folks who contributed to this project.
trans-unit.target: This project is maintained by Raphael Michel <mail@raphaelmichel.de>. See the AUTHORS file for a list of all the awesome folks who contributed to this project.

trans-unit.source: To get started using pretix on your own server, look at the installation guide in our documentation.
trans-unit.target: To get started using pretix on your own server, look at the installation guide in our documentation.

trans-unit.source: We have a Code of Conduct in place that applies to all project contributions, including issues, pull requests, etc.
trans-unit.target: We have a Code of Conduct in place that applies to all project contributions, including issues, pull requests, etc.

trans-unit.source: While there is always a lot to do and improve on, pretix by now has been in use for more than a dozen conferences that sold over ten thousand tickets combined without major problems. We therefore think of pretix as being stable and ready to use.
trans-unit.target: やるべきことや改善すべきことは常にたくさんありますが、pretixは今までに10数回のカンファレンスで使用され、大きな問題なく1万枚以上のチケットを販売してきました。そのため、pretixは安定しており、すぐに使えると考えています。

trans-unit.source: branch contains a development version that we also try to keep stable in the sense that it does not break your data, but its APIs might change without prior notice.
trans-unit.target: ブランチには開発バージョンが含まれており、データを壊さないという意味で安定した状態を保つようにしていますが、そのAPIは予告なしに変更されることがあります。
ブランチを使用しています。のブランチには、このリポジトリの
リリース/エックスワイ
